Plot: Doyle's final novel featuring the beloved sleuth, Sherlock Holmes, brings the detective and his friend to a country manor where they are preceded by either a murder or a suicide. A secretive organization lies culprit and an infiltration of it is in order. Duration: 6 hr., 25 min.
Setting: London, England (United Kingdom), Birlstone, Sussex, England (United Kingdom), Vermissa Valley, Pennsylvania (United States)
